# Structure:
#   USER:<username>[:<group>][:<role>]
# where <group> is the group the user needs to be assigned to
# and <role> is the role the user has
# Note: Users can be added to an existing group using the assign user to group function. Similar for add user to role function.
# Note: The initial password will be generated by the script

USER:demo_user:grp_demo:Operator
